name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ADIMYL - A Day In MY Life

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Each day of your life counts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Most people overestimate what they can do in one year and underestimate what they can do in ten years." 
- Bill Gates

We help you to track your progress each day and use it for motivation to achieve more next day. 

Nothing motivates us more than our own actions. Today's progress is motivation for tomorrow.
